# iNZight Addons

Below is a list of available addons for iNZight.

```{r, echo = FALSE}
source('create_index.R')
tbl <- create_index()
write.dcf(tbl, "addons.txt")
knitr::kable(tbl, row.names = FALSE)
```

To install, download the file and place it `Documents/iNZightVIT/modules`. It will then show up in iNZight's Advanced menu.
